trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When a service that derives from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService> class encounters an exception that it cannot handle, it can call the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> method to tell the workflow runtime engine to raise the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Gdy usługa, która jest pochodną <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>napotka klasy jako wyjątek, który go nie może obsłużyć, można wywołać <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>metody mówić aparatu wykonawczego workflow podnieść <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService>

trans-unit.source: The service passes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance and the <xref:System.Exception> associated with this event in its call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Usługa przekazuje <xref:System.Guid>wystąpienie przepływu pracy i <xref:System.Exception>skojarzone z tym zdarzeniem w jego wywołaniu <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService.RaiseServicesExceptionNotHandledEvent%2A> </xref:System.Exception> </xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine encapsulates these parameters in a ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs and raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Te parametry ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs i zgłasza hermetyzuje aparatu wykonawczego workflow <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: From inside of a subscriber to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event, you can read the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> property and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to get the information associated with a particular <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Z wewnątrz subskrybentom <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>zdarzeń, możesz przeczytać <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A>Właściwości i <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A>Właściwości, aby uzyskać informacje skojarzone z określonego <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.ServicesExceptionNotHandledEventArgs.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera wyjątek, który może nie być obsługiwane przez usługę.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Exception> that represents the exception that could not be handled by the service.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Exception>reprezentujący wyjątek, który może nie być obsługiwane przez usługę.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <xref:System.Guid>wystąpienia przepływu pracy skojarzonego z nieobsługiwany wyjątek.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: WorkflowInstanceId is equivalent to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the workflow instance associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: WorkflowInstanceId jest odpowiednikiem <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>wystąpienia przepływu pracy skojarzonego z <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>zdarzeń.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>Wystąpienia przepływu pracy skojarzonego z nieobsługiwany wyjątek.</xref:System.Guid>
